Project.Brief history of your project and organi: After completing our trip around Hainan Island, we planned a one month tourism and office trip to Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, passing through Guilin, Yangshuo, Hechi, Liuzhou, Nanning, Chongzuo, Fangchenggang, and Beihai, and finally returning to Changsha, Hunan
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Some short video clips of traveling work, including videos, photos, etc.

All tools inside singularity
